channel.title: How do i get ancients spell book? And how do i cast?
channel.description: I have no idea how to get the aicnents book.. please helP! and also do i need runes to cast?

item.title: How do i get ancients spell book? And how do i cast?
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

how doyou cast?simply click the spell and then click the pseron you want to cast on.

item.title: How do i get ancients spell book? And how do i cast?
item.dc:creator: @Fluxedaway Fluxedaway
item.description:
@Fluxedaway wrote:

There is no thing such as ancients book, just the staff, ancients are on the block next to friends list, as for the runes you dont need them in most servers, just the required level to cast the spell.

Read full topic
